DOC.brief_summary: This study intend evaluate safety efficacy Iguratimod patient active Rheumatoid Arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Iguratimod Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , open , single arm study .
DOC.criteria: Subjects diagnosis RA Subjects active RA time screen Subjects n't use antirheumatic drug use antirheumatic drug 3 month time screen Written informed consent Subjects serious cardiovascular , renal , hematologic endocrine disease Pregnant lactate woman ALT > 1.5×ULN , AST > 1.5×ULN , Cr > 135umol/L WBC < 4×109/L，HGB < 85g/L，PLT < 100×109/L Subjects uncontrolled infection Patients active gastrointestinal disease ( gastric ulcer , etc . ) Allergic study drug History alcoholism Subjects receive live vaccine within 3 month prior study entry Subjects participate clinical study within 3 month prior study entry
